weight: Approx. 127 g (including battery/batteries and memory card)
exposurecompensation: +/- 2 EV in 1/3 stop increments. Enhanced i-Contrast for automatic dynamic range correction

computer: Hi-Speed USB (MTP, PTP) dedicated connector (Mini-B compatible)
speed: 1 1/2000 sec. (factory default) 15 1/2000 sec. (total range varies by shooting mode)

batterylife: Approx. 230 shots Eco Mode: Approx. 310 shots Approx. 240min. playback
casesstraps: Soft Case DCC-1370 Soft Case DCC-1350 Soft Case DCC-1320

closestfocusingdistance: 1 cm (W) from front of lens in macro
externalflash: Canon High Power Flash HF-DC1 Canon High Power Flash HF-DC2

settings: Auto (including Face Detection WB), Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Custom

movies: (HD) 1280 x 720, 25 fps, (L) 640 x 480, 30 fps Miniature Effect (HD) 5fps, 2.5fps, 1.25 fps Miniature Effect (L) 6fps, 3fps, 1.5 fps
movielength: The following Speed Class memory cards are required for maximum record time: (HD) 1280 x 720 Speed Class 4 or above. (Full HD) 1920 x 1080 Speed Class 6 or above. (iFrame) 1280 x 720 Speed Class 6 or above. Depending on memory card speed / capacity / compression setting.
